reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater to be of great quality and very soft.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfy
items.body: The media could not be loaded. Oh my goodness this top is exactly the way it’s advertised to be and it’s fab. I’m a 36C and I usually wear a size medium but I decided to go for a large with this too because I wanted to do the off shoulder look like the model in the product photos. If you don’t want a slouchy off shoulder look, I’d recommend your usual size. Pros -so soft! -really nice and somewhat thick sweater quality - feels so comfortable on - lots of compliments Cons -genuinely hard to think of one, maybe it would be nice if the wrists were a little tighter? But then again I decided to go a size above my usual size Read more
items.author: Noelle

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Style
items.body: Soft, elegant. Exactly what I needed. Read more
items.author: Yolanda Johnson

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Quality is okay
items.body: Heavy material which is good. This is an egg white color.. you look best when you have a slim waist to emphasise the sexiness of this tops Read more
items.author: rmp

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy it
items.body: Super cute. Great quality! Read more
items.author: Jai

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sweater
items.body: Thick sweater, good quality and flattering to wear Read more
items.author: Pam

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Long sleeves
items.body: The sleeves are very long, quality seems to be okay. Read more
items.author: Noi O'Brien

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very soft
items.body: Love the sweater I love it great material soft and comfortable!! True to size Read more
items.author: PicolaTravels

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent, but not for me
items.body: This sweater is cute, but I'm not sure it's for me. It is extremely fitted through the waist but then has a lot more room in the chest and arms. The quality seems decent, although the knit is slightly scratchy. Not so bad that it's unwearable, but I wouldn't describe it as soft/snuggly. In terms of sizing, I can fluctuate between a small and a medium in tops. I ordered this in a medium and am glad that I did. I wouldn't have wanted the waist portion to be any more fitted than it is. Read more
items.author: Megan | Closet Full of Chaos

short_description:
Womens Dress Boat Neck One Shoulder is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

long_description:
Womens Dress Boat Neck One Shoulder is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Beige, Black, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
